title: What are the contributions of the Americans in science and technology of the Philippines? - Quora

response.answer_text: Science and Technology has developed rapidly during the American occupation. The educational system expanded with free elementary education and some vocational high school patterned after the American system. University of the Philippines was established to mirror the American system. Though Spain thru the friars established few schools and one of the oldest University in the world University of Santo Tomas only elite Filipinos can enter.
